message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.GT. 

This paper discusses the use of deep reinforcement learning (DRL) to learn to play the Pong game from a sequence of screen snapshots without game-specific hand-crafted features. The paper focuses on the policy gradient method and the use of artificial neural networks (ANN) to approximate a policy of the RL model. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CV (Computer Vision). Additionally, the paper also discusses the use of different ANN architectures and the activation of hidden nodes, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory).
